section.p: is distributed in the installation package, . It contains the software and documentation for installing and configuring .

The package includes: ##to be updated for the final delivery##
CMM_server_2.0.0_images.tar:
Tarred archive file with the Docker images required for installing and configuring .
docker-compose-metrics.yml and docker-compose-log.yml:
Docker Compose YAML files required for installing and configuring .
.env:
Docker Compose environment file defining the default environment variables used by Docker Compose.
monasca-agent-2.0.0.run:
Executable for installing a Metrics Agent on an OpenStack node.
log-agent-2.0.0.run:
Executable for installing a Log Agent on an OpenStack node.
monasca-ui-2.0.0.run:
Executable for installing the Horizon Plugin on the node where the OpenStack Horizon Service is deployed.
Manuals subdirectory:
PDF manuals providing an overview of as well as information directed to system operators and application operators.
